Class com.google.common.io.CharStreams

Added Methods
CharSource asCharSource(String) Returns a CharSource that reads the given string value.
T readLines(Readable, LineProcessor<T>) Streams lines from a Readable object, stopping when the processor returns {@code false} or all lines have been read and returning the result produced by the processor.
